meanings.sent1: She did a decentest job on her school project.
meanings.sent2: This is the decentest cake I have ever tasted.
meanings.sent3: Even though it was a decentest attempt, he still didn't win the race.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the decentest ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The decentest flower in the garden bloomed brightly.

meanings.sent1: The quality of the product was decentest for the price.
meanings.sent2: He always wears the decentest clothes to work.
meanings.sent3: The decentest level of noise in the library is still too loud for me.
meanings.sent4: Her handwriting was the decentest calligraphy I had ever seen.
meanings.sent5: The decentest painting in the gallery caught everyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: She made the decentest effort to finish the race.
meanings.sent2: The team put up a decentest fight against the champions.
meanings.sent3: His decentest dance moves always brought a smile to everyone's face.
meanings.sent4: The decentest student in the class was always willing to help others.
meanings.sent5: The decentest apple in the basket was saved for last.
